# The `InstrItineraryData` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Itinerary data supplied by a subtarget to be used by a target. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="bool"
  name={<><a href="#a94e1f552980744a8937ef75c00232c8d">hasPipelineForwarding</a> (unsigned DefClass, unsigned DefIdx, unsigned UseClass, unsigned UseIdx) const</>}>
Return true if there is a pipeline forwarding between instructions of itinerary classes DefClass and UseClasses so that value produced by an instruction of itinerary class DefClass, operand index DefIdx can be bypassed when it&#39;s read by an instruction of itinerary class UseClass, operand index UseIdx. <a href="#a94e1f552980744a8937ef75c00232c8d">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

Itinerary data supplied by a subtarget to be used by a target.

Return -1 for classes that require dynamic lookup via <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a>.

### getOperandLatency() {#a702e147674b97e4ec87922e263e1ca73}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; unsigned &gt; llvm::InstrItineraryData::getOperandLatency (unsigned DefClass, unsigned DefIdx, unsigned UseClass, unsigned UseIdx) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Compute and return the use operand latency of a given itinerary class and operand index if the value is produced by an instruction of the specified itinerary class and def operand index.

Return std::nullopt if the information is not available for the operand.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcinstritineraries-h/#l00208">208</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcinstritineraries-h">MCInstrItineraries.h</a>.

### getStageLatency() {#a51623c0621a7c092ac9210065f861a33}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::InstrItineraryData::getStageLatency (unsigned ItinClassIndx) const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the total stage latency of the given class.

The latency is the maximum completion time for any stage in the itinerary. If no stages exist, it defaults to one cycle.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcinstritineraries-h/#l00150">150</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcinstritineraries-h">MCInstrItineraries.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### hasPipelineForwarding() {#a94e1f552980744a8937ef75c00232c8d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::InstrItineraryData::hasPipelineForwarding (unsigned DefClass, unsigned DefIdx, unsigned UseClass, unsigned UseIdx) const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return true if there is a pipeline forwarding between instructions of itinerary classes DefClass and UseClasses so that value produced by an instruction of itinerary class DefClass, operand index DefIdx can be bypassed when it&#39;s read by an instruction of itinerary class UseClass, operand index UseIdx.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcinstritineraries-h/#l00186">186</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcinstritineraries-h">MCInstrItineraries.h</a>.
